item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Yep, it’s that link. And itzkyle is right, the += 20 is the level increase. Grand’s increase level by 20, Boost’s increase level by 7 on my server. Enjoy it.

item.title: Hate Asking for help but.. Telenubbi'es Source
item.dc:creator: @Sane Sane
item.description:
@Sane wrote:

I have telenubbys source and im trieng to figure out a way to change the levels that the lunar spells give you. as in grand strength gives you 7 I can not figure out how to change this anyone would kno?

This is an example of it

case 16202: //Lunar - Grand Strength if(lunar_4 == -1) { if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 93)) { stillgfx(287, absY, absX); playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += 20; sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; lunarTimer = 300; sendMessage("You boost your Strength by 20 Levels."); } else if(playerLevel[6] < 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell"); } else if(lunarTimer >= 1) { sendMessage("You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds."); } } break;

Read full topic
